select DATE_FORMAT(convert_tz(`date`, @@session.time_zone,'+08:00'), '%Y') from device_maintenance left join device on device.id = device_maintenance.device_id where 1 = 1
and adcode like concat(adcode, '%')
and town=#{town}
group by DATE_FORMAT(convert_tz(`date`, @@session.time_zone,'+08:00'), '%Y')

select sum(num) beetlesNum,sum(other_num) otherNum,MONTH(`date`) CustomTown from device_maintenance t1 left join device t2 on t1.device_id = t2.id where CustomProject = #{customProject} and DATE(`date`)>= #{startDate} and #{endDate} >=DATE(`date`) group by MONTH(`date`)

select sum(num) beetlesNum,sum(other_num) otherNum,((sum(num) + sum(other_num))/count(device_Id)) avager,batch CustomTown from device_maintenance t1 left join device t2 on t1.device_id = t2.id where CustomProject = #{customProject} group by batch

select username workerName,count(device_Id) num,DATE(`date`) currentDate from device_maintenance t1 left join device t2 on t1.device_id = t2.id where CustomProject = #{customProject} and DATE(`date`)>= #{startDate} and #{endDate} >=DATE(`date`) group by workerName,DATE(`date`)
